justification: Proposal ignores Team B’s ceiling-chasing, expert-consensus mindset and their preference for young ascending players with strong playoff schedules—traits Isaiah Thompson has. Offering a Tier 5 workhorse RB for a Tier 2 ascending WR is a value mismatch; no argument why B would part with Isaiah or how it fits B’s roster. P_accept is optimistic; rationale is generic and mislabels Isaiah as a “reliable WR1.”
